name: Rhiannon, The Moon Goddess
description:
"Rhiannon, The Moon Goddess" is an adaptation of a 14th century Welsh myth.

This game was made for the 2021 Historically Accurate Game Jam

Programming: Snowy
Backgrounds, additional character art: Robbie
Composition and SFX: matheus_klein.mk
Story, character art, GUI design: fyshku productions

Used free assets:
Valiesse https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise
Streets of Sant'lvo https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ask%20Again
A castle picture
